name: Ecobound: Escape from the Red Sector
name_original: Ecobound: Escape from the Red Sector
description: In this short but alluring game, you play as an innocent being, who was captured by those of the Red Sector. The Red Sector is a place of malignance where they capture and convert innocent beings to become their own, but you are gifted with great strength, unlike others who have previously faced the Red Sector, which provides you with the chance to fight your way through the evil forces of the sector and make your way through various obstacles to make your way home.
